mapper.sql: SELECT C.CART_ID, C.WINE_BNO, C.WINE_NAME, C.ID, C.WINE_PRICE, C.AMOUNT, C.RENAMED_FILENAME FROM CART C
mapper.select: select c.cart_id, w.WINE_NAME, w.amount, w.WINE_PRICE, w.RENAMED_FILENAME, m.id from cart c left join member m on c.id = m.id left join bebeno_wineboard w on c.wine_bno = w.wine_bno where c.wine_bno = w.wine_bno
mapper.insert: insert into cart ( cart_id, id, wine_bno, cart_qty, RENAMED_FILENAME ) values ( SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{wine_bno}, #{cart_qty}, #{RENAMED_FILENAME} )
